findings.title: Change can be sent to relayer
findings.description: When an exceeding amount is sent to the contract, the outstanding amount is returned to msg.sender which could be a meta transaction relayer. This can cause issues since transfer() only forwards a small amount of gas, which might not be enough to perform the necessary calculations to return to the original user.

findings.title: Consider using alias or constants instead of magic numbers
findings.description: Using magic variables can lead to mistakes during development and are hard to notice. It is recommended to use aliases or constant variables to ensure decimal places.
